solution_line_template: He ran the {total_distance_km} kilometers in a total of {first_half_time} + {second_half_time} = <<{first_half_time}+{second_half_time}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes} minutes.

Therefore, he ran at a pace of {total_time_minutes} minutes / {total_distance_km} kilometers = <<{total_time_minutes}/{total_distance_km}={average_time_per_km}>>{average_time_per_km} minutes per kilometer.
